CONTENT: この決闘 絶対勝って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have to win this duel,

CONTENT: あんたの退学と 私の結婚がかかってるんだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: para que a ti no te echen y a mí no me fuercen a casarme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so you won't be expelled and I won't be forced to marry.

CONTENT: 嫌... です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't want to.

CONTENT: はあ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 一緒に戦う流れでしょ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It only makes sense for us to fight together now!

CONTENT: リストが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My list...

CONTENT: 学校に来たら⸺　やりたいことリスト... です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hice una lista de las cosas que quería hacer al venir a la escuela.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I made a list of things I wanted to do when I went to school.

CONTENT: 友達を作る あだ名で呼ぶ　図書館で勉強 屋上でご飯
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hacer amigos, llamarlos por sus apodos, estudiar en la biblioteca, comer en la azotea...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Make friends, call them by nicknames, study in the library, eat lunch on the roof,

CONTENT: それと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and...

CONTENT: デートする...　なんて?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: go on dates. What's that?

CONTENT: デートするです! お... どあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to go on dates!

CONTENT: ぐうう... 色ボケ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're sex-crazed.

CONTENT: けけ... 結婚したら デートできません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No podré tener citas cuando esté casada!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I can't go on dates once I'm married!

CONTENT: すればいいじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whyever not?

CONTENT: 不倫... は... ダメです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cheating is wrong!

CONTENT: 大丈夫よ 今すぐってわけじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Calm down! It's not going to happen right away.

CONTENT: 結婚できるのは17歳からでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La edad legal para el matrimonio son los 17 años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The legal age for marriage is 17.

CONTENT: だから 私の誕生日まで 結婚はお預け
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por lo que, como mínimo, no será hasta mi cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which means it won't happen until my birthday, at least.

CONTENT: そ... そうなんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Really?

CONTENT: 私は必ず ここを脱出して地球に行く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Saldré de aquí e iré a la Tierra como sea.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to escape here and go to Earth, no matter what.

CONTENT: あんたは それまで花婿でいて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Haz que eres mi prometida hasta entonces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You just have to play my groom until then.

CONTENT: これは取り引きよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's make a deal.

CONTENT: お疲れさまです 御曹司
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Welcome back, young master.

CONTENT: いかがです? ダリルバルデは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How did you like the Darilbalde?

CONTENT: このモビルスーツに何を仕込んだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué diablos le hicieron a este Mobile Suit?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the heck did you do to this mobile suit?

CONTENT: 第5世代の意思拡張AIです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tiene una IA de toma decisiones de quinta generación.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We added a 5th-generation Decision Making Extension AI.

CONTENT: ベータ版ですが⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's still a beta version,

CONTENT: 今までの戦闘データから 複合ベース予測で...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero toma predicciones bayesianas de combates previos y...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but it makes composite Bayesian predictions from previous combat data-

CONTENT: 俺の腕じゃ勝てないってのか!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Dices que no tengo habilidad para ganar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Am I not skilled enough to win?

CONTENT: 父さん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dad...

CONTENT: このスタッフもダリルバルデも⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I gathered these staff members

CONTENT: お前を勝たせるために 俺が集めたのだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y te di el Darilbalde para que ganaras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: as well as the Darilbalde just to make you win.

CONTENT: 子供のプライドが入る余地はない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no room here for childish pride!

CONTENT: 大人扱いしてほしければ 勝ってホルダーを取り戻せ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si quieres que te trate como un adulto, gana y recupera el título de Holder.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you want to be treated like an adult, then win and reclaim the title of Holder!

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, sir.

CONTENT: ねえ お母さん　ガンダムって何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say, Mom. What's a Gundam?

CONTENT: どうしたの いきなり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué me lo preguntas de pronto?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's this all of a sudden?

CONTENT: ベネリット社の人がね⸺　エアリアルのこと ガンダムだっていうの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La gente del Benerit Group dice que el Aerial es un Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: People from the Benerit Group say that Aerial's a Gundam.

CONTENT: 私のことも魔女だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And they even call me a witch.

CONTENT: そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it true?

CONTENT: お母さん⸺　スレッタを魔女に育てた覚えは ないんだけどなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No recuerdo haberte criado como una bruja.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't recall raising you as a witch.

CONTENT: 私もないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Neither do I.

CONTENT: もちろん 昔の事件も⸺　ガンダムのことも知ってる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero sé lo de aquel incidente y lo de los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course, I know about that past incident, and about Gundams.

CONTENT: でも スレッタと エアリアルは違うわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ni el Aerial ni tú son así, Suletta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But you and Aerial aren't like that, Suletta.

CONTENT: 私のかわいい娘だもの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're my precious daughters.

CONTENT: お母さんが保証する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your mom will vouch for you.

CONTENT: それより時間はいいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, don't you have to leave yet?

CONTENT: あ... ああ!　あ... じゃあ お母さん お仕事 頑張って!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, no! Well, good luck at work, Mom!

CONTENT: ありがと　あなたも いってらっしゃい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias. Buena suerte a ti también.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you. Good luck to you too.

CONTENT: スレッタ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta.

CONTENT: あれ 水星の...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look, there she is. The Mercurian girl.

CONTENT: ズルしたやつ?　やり直しだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿La tramposa? -Dicen que se repetirá el duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I heard the duel's being redone. The one who cheated?

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリーさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Suletta Mercury!

CONTENT: おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good morning!

CONTENT: あ... ここ... この前は あえやとました...　見てたよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thank you for your- I was watching it!

CONTENT: スッゴいね あなたのモビルスーツ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your mobile suit was amazing!

CONTENT: 群体制御には どんな階層構造を使っているの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué estructura de capa usa para el control de masas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What kind of layer structure is it using for its swarm control?

CONTENT: 従来の構造? それとも同時的空間コンセプト?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Es convencional o se basa en un concepto espacial simultáneo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it a conventional one? Or is it based on a simultaneous spatial concept?

CONTENT: お母さんが... 確か...　継起的空間と併用って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi mamá dijo algo de \"usar espacios sucesivos\"...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My mom said something about \"using successive spaces concurrently...\"

CONTENT: そっか! 確かに それなら⸺　あの概念統合スキーマの 意味は分かるわ! あれで...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Claro! Ahora entiendo el esquema de síntesis de conceptos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's it! Now I understand the concept-synthesizing schema.

CONTENT: おい 水星女
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It enables it to clear the friction- Hey! Mercurian wench!

CONTENT: この前の決闘は無効だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our last duel was voided.

CONTENT: 今度こそ決着をつけてやる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now we'll settle things for real.

CONTENT: スレッタさん? じゃ...　じゃあ 決闘の相手って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Suletta? -Bueno, pues en ese caso... ¿Quién será mi rival?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Suletta? W-Well, if that's the case, then... My opponent will be...

CONTENT: 俺だ　よかったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Me. That's a relief.

CONTENT: よかっただと! ひいー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A relief?!

CONTENT: う... だだだだだだ... だって...　一度 か... 勝ってますし...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que ya te gané una vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well, you know, I already won once...

CONTENT: 調子に乗るなよ 田舎者が...　あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't get carried away, you bumpkin!

CONTENT: し... 失礼します! あ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well then, I'll be going! What?

CONTENT: スレッタさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Suletta!

CONTENT: 審問会では お力添え ありがとうございました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu ayuda en la investigación fue muy valiosa. Gracias.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your help in the inquiry was invaluable. Thank you very much.

CONTENT: 人を脅しておいて しらじらしいな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me habías chantajeado. No seas sarcástica.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You blackmailed me. Don't be sarcastic.

CONTENT: 今後は お互い 不干渉でいきましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mantengámonos al margen el uno del otro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's not meddle in each other's business from now on.

CONTENT: 暗殺の件 なぜ 分かった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo supiste lo del intento de asesinato?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How did you know about the assassination attempt?

CONTENT: 企業秘密です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Call it a trade secret.

CONTENT: デリングは なぜ シン・セーの言い分を黙認した?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué Delling no rechazó la petición de Shin Sei?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why didn't Delling object to Shin Sei's request?

CONTENT: ヴィム・ジェタークの 擁護も引っかかる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que los defienda Vim Jeturk me inquieta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Vim Jeturk's defending them bothers me, too.

CONTENT: シン・セー開発公社代表　プロスペラ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Prospera Mercury, representante de la Compañía Shin Sei.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Prospera Mercury, representative of the Shin Sei Development Corporation.

CONTENT: 水星開拓団出身　現地で結婚 スレッタ・マーキュリーを出産
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estaba en el Grupo de Desarrollo de Mercurio, se casó y tuvo a Suletta Mercury.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She belonged to the Mercury Development Group, married in the field, and gave birth to Suletta Mercury.

CONTENT: 資源採掘時の事故により半身を損傷
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las heridas de la mitad de su cuerpo se deben a un accidente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Injuries to half her body from a resource mining accident...

CONTENT: あのヘッドギアと右腕は そういう事情でしたか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso explica lo del casco y el brazo derecho.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that explains the headgear and right arm.

CONTENT: 開発責任者の名義も彼女だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Está oficialmente a cargo del desarrollo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's officially in charge of development, too.

CONTENT: あんな辺境のどこに そんな 資金とインフラがあるんです?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo encontraría fondos e infraestructura en ese páramo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How would she find funds and infrastructure in that backwater?

CONTENT: モビルスーツ技師の 登録履歴すらないのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No hay registros suyos como ingeniera de Mobile Suits.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no record of her registry as a mobile suit engineer.

CONTENT: ならば 誰が あの機体を作った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In that case, who could have built that machine?

CONTENT: シャディク
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shaddiq.

CONTENT: お前は娘のほうを探れ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You look into the daughter.

CONTENT: はい 義父さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, Father.

CONTENT: おもしろくなってきたな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Things are getting interesting.

CONTENT: よし ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All done.

CONTENT: 肥料 ここに置きます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll leave the fertilizer here.

CONTENT: 持ってきて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bring it to me.

CONTENT: 入って... よい... ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't mind if I come in?

CONTENT: いいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go ahead.

CONTENT: あ... 私たち親友ってこと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does this mean we're best friends?

CONTENT: はあ? すみません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? - Sorry!

CONTENT: まあ あんたが決闘に負けたら⸺　2人共 終わりだしね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seamos lo que seamos, si pierdes el duelo, será el fin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, whatever we are, if you lose that duel, it's over for both of us.

CONTENT: すみません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry.

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury.

CONTENT: エラン... さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan, right?

CONTENT: ああ... あの... 先日は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thank you for...

CONTENT: 君を呼びに来た　決闘委員会に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vengo a convocarte a una reunión del Comité de Duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came here to summon you to a Dueling Committee meeting.

CONTENT: 委員会?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A committee?

CONTENT: そいつは決闘委員会の メンバーなのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Este tipo es del Comité de Duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This guy's a member of the Dueling Committee.

CONTENT: 連絡先 分からなかったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I didn't know how to reach you.

CONTENT: 交換 いいかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: May we exchange contacts?

CONTENT: リストの12番 叶いました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El número 12 de mi lista se cumplió.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Number 12 on my list came true.

CONTENT: リスト?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your list?

CONTENT: 連絡先の交換
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Darle a alguien mi información de contacto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Exchanging contact info with someone.

CONTENT: 学校に来たら やりたいなって思ってて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era algo que quería hacer cuando viniera a la escuela.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It was something I wanted to try when I got to school.

CONTENT: ほかには どんなことが?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What else is on your list?

CONTENT: 友達を作る あだ名で呼ぶ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hacer amigos, llamarlos por sus apodos...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Making friends, calling them by nicknames...

CONTENT: デートする　ミオリネさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Going on dates. Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: リスト... あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hope...

CONTENT: たくさん叶うといいね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que cumplas muchos de esos deseos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you'll fulfill many wishes on your list.

CONTENT: ようこそ 決闘委員会のラウンジへ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sé bienvenida a la sala del Comité de Duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Welcome to the Dueling Committee Lounge.

CONTENT: 僕は シャディク・ゼネリっていう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My name is Shaddiq Zenelli.

CONTENT: よろしくね 水星ちゃん　よ... よろしく お願いまんまと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Encantado de conocerte, señorita mercuriana. Encancerte de cono...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice to meet you, Mercurian Miss. Nice to m-meet...

CONTENT: じゃあ 始めようか　はい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shall we begin? What?

CONTENT: 宣誓だよ 決闘のね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The oath. For the duel.

CONTENT: 双方 魂の代償をリーブラに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que ambas partes depositen sus almas en las balanzas de Libra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Both parties, deposit your souls on Libra's scales.

CONTENT: 決闘者は グエル・ジェタークと スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los duelistas son Guel Jeturk y Suletta Mercury.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The duelists are Guel Jeturk and Suletta Mercury.

CONTENT: 場所は戦術試験区域7番
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se hará en el séptimo sector de pruebas tácticas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The location will be the 7th tactical testing sector.

CONTENT: 1対1の個人戦を採用
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con el código de uno contra uno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The one-on-one code will apply.

CONTENT: 異論はないか?　ああ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any objections? None.

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー　君は この決闘に何を賭ける?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Suletta Mercury, ¿qué pones en juego en este duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury, what is your stake in this duel?

CONTENT: えっと...
決闘には それぞれ 何かを賭けることになっている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los duelos requieren que todos se jueguen algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our duels require you each to place something on the line.

CONTENT: 金 謝罪 女
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Money, an apology, a woman...

CONTENT: 女を賭けるのは お前だけだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres el único que se apostaría una mujer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're the only one who'd bet women.

CONTENT: 人聞きが悪いなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No soy tan malo como crees.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not as bad as you think.

CONTENT: 相手の男が返せって 言ってくるだけだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y sé que siempre exigirán que devuelva a las chicas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I know they'll always demand I give the girls back.

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー　あ... はい えっと...　ミオリネさんに謝ってください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Suletta Mercury. -Ah, sí. Este... Discúlpate con Miorine, por favor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury. Oh, right! Um... please apologize to Ms. Miorine.

CONTENT: グエル・ジェターク 君は この決闘に何を賭ける?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Guel Jeturk, ¿qué te juegas en el duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Guel Jeturk, what is your stake in this duel?

CONTENT: 前と同じでいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Same as last time.

CONTENT: Alea jacta est 決闘を承認する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Alea jacta est. El duelo está aprobado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Alea jacta est. The duel is approved.

CONTENT: いいっすよねー グエル先輩は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How nice for you, Mr. Guel.

CONTENT: 親が偉いと 決闘の負けも無効にしてもらえて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con unos papás influyentes hasta puedes deshacer el resultado de un duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When you have powerful parents, you can even undo the results of a duel.

CONTENT: 今度負けたら 言い訳できませんよー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tendrás excusa si pierdes esta vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You'll have no excuse if you lose this time.

CONTENT: やめといたほうが いいと思うけどなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si fuera tú, yo me lo replantearía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I were you, I'd reconsider.

CONTENT: 俺と決闘したいなら そう言え セセリア
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Si quieres un duelo contra mí, dímelo, Secelia!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you want to duel me, just say so, Secelia!

CONTENT: アドバイスですよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo te estoy dando un consejo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm giving you advice.

CONTENT: これ以上 先輩の市場価値が 下がらないようにって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No quiero ver que tu valor en el mercado sigue bajando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't want to see your market value drop any lower.

CONTENT: あ... でも もう底値かー　く... アハハハハ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or has it already bottomed out?

CONTENT: ダメ... です!　あ? あ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Stop it! No!

CONTENT: 水星ちゃん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mercurian Miss?

CONTENT: に... 逃げない人を笑うのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Reírse de alguien que no huye...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: L-Laughing at someone who doesn't run away is...

CONTENT: ダメ... なんです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's wrong!

CONTENT: なぜ あんなことを言った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why would you say something like that?

CONTENT: お前も俺を 笑いたいんじゃないのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't you want to laugh at me, too?

CONTENT: 逃げたら1つだからです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's because \"If you run, you gain one.\"

CONTENT: た... 例えば⸺　スッゴい強い敵がいて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por ejemplo, si te enfrentas a un enemigo fuerte,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: F-For example, if you're facing a strong enemy,

CONTENT: でも 逃げたら 安全... 安心が手に入ります
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: si huyes, ganas seguridad y resguardo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: by running away, you'd gain safety and security.

CONTENT: 俺は逃げん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wouldn't run.

CONTENT: でも 戦ったら負けちゃうかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si peleas, puede que pierdas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if you fight, you might lose!

CONTENT: 俺は負けん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wouldn't lose!

CONTENT: 前回のは まぐれだからな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La última vez ganaste por suerte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The last time was a fluke.

CONTENT: まぐれじゃないです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It wasn't a fluke.

CONTENT: 油断さえなければ俺が勝つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Habría ganado si no hubiera bajado la guardia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I hadn't let my guard down, I would have won.

CONTENT: つまり 負け... たんですよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esa es otra forma de decir que perdiste.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which is another way of saying you lost, right?

CONTENT: でも 大丈夫です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But either way, it's okay.

CONTENT: あ? 何がだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? What's okay?

CONTENT: 逃げずに進んだら 逃げなかった自分とか⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si avanzas sin huir, ganas confianza en ti mismo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you move forward without running, you gain confidence in yourself,

CONTENT: 経験とか 認められたりとか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: or experience, or recognition.

CONTENT: 逃げるより いっぱい手に入るんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se gana mucho más que huyendo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You gain a lot more than you would by running.

CONTENT: だから 逃げたら1つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's why \"If you run, you gain one.\"

CONTENT: 進めば2つって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And, \"If you move forward, you gain two.\"

CONTENT: そいつは ご立派な哲学で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's quite a philosophy.

CONTENT: お母さんが⸺　教えてくれたんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My mother taught it to me.

CONTENT: お母さんは いつも強くて... 優しくて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi mamá siempre es muy fuerte y buena.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My mother is always strong and kind.

CONTENT: いい親なんだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A good parent, huh?

CONTENT: はい 私の目標で...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. El objetivo de mi vida es ser como...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes. My life's goal is to be like...

CONTENT: 訳分かんないです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't get him.

CONTENT: グエル先輩!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Guel!

CONTENT: 機体の準備できてます!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your machine is ready!

CONTENT: あんな田舎者 ボッコボコにしてくださいよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Dale a esa pueblerina una paliza que no olvide nunca!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please give that bumpkin a beating she won't forget!

CONTENT: にいさん ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Brother.

CONTENT: これは にいさんだけの決闘じゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Este duelo no es solo por ti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This isn't a duel just for yourself.

CONTENT: ドミニコスのエースパイロット　諦めてはいないんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No abandonaste la idea de ser el piloto as de Dominicus, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You haven't given up on being the ace pilot of Dominicus, right?

CONTENT: ああ 俺は⸺　必ず勝つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. Y pienso ganar a cualquier precio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I haven't. And I'm going to win at any cost.

CONTENT: パーメットリンク よし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet link established.

CONTENT: 各兵装 よし ご飯も食べた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Armament, all green. I ate properly, too.

CONTENT: スレッタ　ミ... ミオリネさん!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta? M-Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: 私の番号も登録しといたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I registered myself in your contacts.

CONTENT: そんな勝手に...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How could you just...

CONTENT: それより分かってる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look, don't you get it?

CONTENT: この決闘 私とあんたの 人生かかってるんだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu futuro y el mío dependen del resultado de este duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your future and mine depend totally on this duel's outcome.

CONTENT: 取り引き 忘れないでよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No olvides el trato que hicimos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't forget the deal we made.

CONTENT: はい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right.

CONTENT: 父さん 学生以外が決闘に関わるのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Papá, solo los alumnos pueden involucrarse en los duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dad, only students are allowed to be involved in duels.

CONTENT: これは社用だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un tema de la empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is company business.

CONTENT: それより手は打ったか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, did you make the arrangement?

CONTENT: はい　ですが... なんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, but... But what?

CONTENT: あんなことをしなくても にいさんは勝ちます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi hermano no necesita trucos así para ganar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My brother doesn't need tricks like that to win.

CONTENT: 始まった? これから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Have they started? Any minute now.

CONTENT: どっち勝つかな グエル先輩っしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder who'll win. It's got to be Mr. Guel!

CONTENT: ジェターク寮が本気出したら⸺　勝てっこないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando los Jeturk se ponen en serio, no hay quien los pare.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once Jeturk House gets serious, there's no stopping them.

CONTENT: これより 双方合意のもと⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con el consentimiento mutuo de ambas partes,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: With mutual consent by both parties,

CONTENT: 決闘を執り行う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we will now begin the duel.

CONTENT: 勝敗は通常どおり⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As always, victory will go

CONTENT: 相手モビルスーツの⸺　ブレードアンテナを 折った者の勝利とする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ganará el primero que rompa la antena del Mobile Suit del rival.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: to the first one to break the blade antenna of their opponent's mobile suit.

CONTENT: 立会人は ペイル寮のエラン・ケレスが務める
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El observador será Elan Ceres, de la Casa Peil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The observer shall be Elan Ceres from Peil House.

CONTENT: MSコンテナから出すわよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can come out of your MS container.

CONTENT: 学籍番号と名前を名乗って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Di tu nombre y tu número de alumna.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: State your name and student ID number.

CONTENT: は... はい　LP041 スレッタ・マーキュリー　エアリアル 出ます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right! LP041. Suletta Mercury, Aerial, launching!

CONTENT: 両者 向顔
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Both parties, face off.

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury...

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes?

CONTENT: 決闘の口上を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please recite the duel vow.

CONTENT: 口上?　さっき教えたでしょ　あ... え... えっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿El juramento? -¡Si te lo acabo de enseñar! Este...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The vow? I taught it to you just now! Um...

CONTENT: 勝敗はー... モビルスーツの... 性能の...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La victoria no se decide solo gracias al Mobile Suit.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Victory is never decided by mobile suit performance alone.

CONTENT: 操縦者の技のみで決まらず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ni tampoco a la pericia del piloto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nor by the skill of the pilot, alone.

CONTENT: ただ結果のみが真実 ただ結果のみが真実...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El resultado es la única verdad. -El resultado es la única verdad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The result itself is the only truth. The result itself is the only truth.

CONTENT: フィックス・リリース
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fix release.

CONTENT: 絶対勝って⸺　ミオリネさんと学校に残ります!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Ganaré el duelo y me quedaré en la escuela con Miorine!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to win and I'll stay at this school with Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: ヤツはオトリだ　あのドローンもどきが 3時方向から... うおっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esas cosas que parecen drones que vienen a las tres son una distracción.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's a diversion. The drone-like things are coming from three o'clock...?

CONTENT: なんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the...

CONTENT: 今のは... あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What just happened?

CONTENT: あたる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll be hit!

CONTENT: 弾かれた!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He deflected it?

CONTENT: こいつ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This thing...

CONTENT: ディランザじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not a Dilanza?

CONTENT: 次代遅れのガンダムが⸺　我が社のダリルバルデに かなうと思うなよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ese Gundam anticuado no es rival para el Darilbalde de nuestra empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Understand that an outdated Gundam is no match for our company's Darilbalde.

CONTENT: この前のと違うモビルスーツです?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Es un Mobile Suit distinto al del otro duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that a different mobile suit from before?

CONTENT: 向こうも本気ってことよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso significa que van en serio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That just means they're serious.

CONTENT: 油断しないで!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't lower your guard!

CONTENT: 後ろを取った!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She got behind him!

CONTENT: ウソ! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No way!

CONTENT: 俺の意思は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you saying...

CONTENT: いらないっていうのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you don't need my will at all?

CONTENT: 消えちゃった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It dissipated.

CONTENT: これ 水?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this water?

CONTENT: 排熱処理か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿El sistema de gestión de calor? -Eso es.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it the heat management system?

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes.

CONTENT: あの量の水散布
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como se está dispersando tanta agua,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Abnormal heat detected within front. With that much water being dispersed...

CONTENT: ビーム兵器の減衰は さけられませんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: las armas de rayos resultarán afectadas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: beam weapons will inevitably be degraded. Emergency water cooling in progress.

CONTENT: 見ろ! 俺の言ったとおりにして正解だろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Take a good look! My plan was right on the money!

CONTENT: 残念だったな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Too bad for you.

CONTENT: 幸運の女神は 俺のほうが好きだとよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Esta vez la suerte está de mi lado!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lady Luck is on my side this time!

CONTENT: 異常もないのに 管理システムが水散布するわけない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ese sistema no puede ponerse a echar agua sin una anomalía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no way the system would start spraying water without an anomaly.

CONTENT: ジェターク寮のやつら 手段は選ばないってこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Those Jeturk House thugs. They'd really go this far?

CONTENT: 今すぐ決闘を止めて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Stop the duel immediately!

CONTENT: システムエラー修復してから 再開するべきよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sigan cuando se corrija el error del sistema.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You should only resume after you've corrected the system error!

CONTENT: 決闘は平等じゃないよ あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Duels are never held on equal terms.

CONTENT: 何言って... その生徒のバック次第で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you saying? It's up to students' patrons

CONTENT: 用意できるモビルスーツも⸺　サポートメンバーも違ってくる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: deciden a qué Mobile Suits y a qué equipo tienen acceso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: which mobile suits and which support staff they can access.

CONTENT: この偶然が たとえ 仕組まれたものだとしても⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque este accidente se hubiera producido adrede,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even if this accident were set up on purpose,

CONTENT: それを含めて彼の力だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that would still be part of his strength.

CONTENT: だったら 私も スレッタの力ってことでいいよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En ese caso, yo puedo ser parte de la fuerza de Suletta, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In that case, you'll allow me to be part of Suletta's strength, won't you?

CONTENT: スレッタ 聞こえる? あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta, do you read me?

CONTENT: ミオリネさん!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine?

CONTENT: このスコールは私が止める!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll stop the squall!

CONTENT: あんたは それまで持ち堪えて!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just hang on until then!

CONTENT: どうすれば...　いいから やられないように頑張って!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But how? Just don't let him beat you!

CONTENT: クソ親父...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My lousy father...

CONTENT: 今度こそ 思いどおりにならないから!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Esta vez no dejaré que salga como él quiere!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This time, I won't let things turn out as he pleases!

CONTENT: モビルクラフト?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A mobile craft?

CONTENT: 持ち堪えろって言われても...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Claro, \"que aguante\". Qué fácil es decirlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Hanging on\" is easier said than done...

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー　君が魔女なら切り抜けられるはずだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Suletta Mercury, si de verdad eres una bruja, podrás sobrevivir a esta situación.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury, if you really are a witch, you can survive this situation.

CONTENT: 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える　持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える 持ち堪える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que aguantar. Tengo que aguantar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've got to hang on. I've got to hang on.

CONTENT: 持ち堪える! ああ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I will hang on!

CONTENT: 助かったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's safe!

CONTENT: けど 時間の問題だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it's still only a matter of time.

CONTENT: 勝負ありかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It looks like the game is over.

CONTENT: 結局 バックの大きさが 勝敗を決めるってことで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al final, el que gana es el que tiene un respaldo más poderoso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In the end, the winner is always the one with the stronger backing.

CONTENT: ああー 惜しいー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Darn! That was so close!

CONTENT: んだよ よけてんじゃねえよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heck, she dodged again. What?

CONTENT: やっぱり あんたたちか　ミオリネ!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I knew it would be you two. Miorine?

CONTENT: モビルクラフトとか卑怯だろ!　どっちが!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Usar eso no es justo! -¿Y lo dicen ustedes?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Using a mobile craft isn't fair! Look who's talking!

CONTENT: あ... や... ウソ なんでもありません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, never mind!

CONTENT: 止まった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It stopped?

CONTENT: おい どうなっている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey! What's going on?

CONTENT: スレッタ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta?

CONTENT: あとは あんたが勝つだけだからね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All that's left now is for you to win.

CONTENT: ありがとう ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks, Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: エアリアル
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aerial...

CONTENT: 今度は 私たちの番だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now it's our turn!

CONTENT: いけえ! 8.6倍ー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go! It's 8.6-to-1 odds!

CONTENT: スペーシアンなんて ぶっ飛ばせ!　いや 彼女も水星から...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Acaba con el Spacian! -Ella tampoco es de la Tierra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Blow the Spacian away! She's not from Earth either.

CONTENT: おい バカ 止まるな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You fool! Don't stop!

CONTENT: あんな分かりやすいオトリに 引っかかりやがって!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No te puede engañar una carnada tan ridícula!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No way you'd be tricked by a decoy that cheap!

CONTENT: グエル! う...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Guel!

CONTENT: 何をやっている! さっさと片をつけろ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you doing? Finish her off!

CONTENT: 父さん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dad?

CONTENT: どうして... あ... まさか さっきの排熱処理は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo lo has...? ¿Lo de la gestión de calor fue culpa tuya?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How did you... Was that heat management thing your doing?

CONTENT: 父さん どうして俺を 信じてくれないんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dad! Why won't you believe in me?

CONTENT: 信じてほしければ ガンダムを潰せ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Si quieres que crea en ti, destruye ese Gundam!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you want me to believe, then crush that Gundam!

CONTENT: 汚い手を使わなければ 俺は勝てないっていうのか!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Crees que no podré ganar jugando limpio?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you think I can't win if I play fair?

CONTENT: それが子供だというんだ　大事なのは結果だ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's the child in you talking. The result is all that matters!

CONTENT: にいさん 今は戦いに集中して!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Brother, just focus on the battle for now!

CONTENT: うう... お前も父さん側のくせに!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Papá y tú solo piensan en lo mismo!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're only saying that for Dad's sake!

CONTENT: お前だけの 決闘じゃないということが⸺　なぜ分からん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué no entiendes que este duelo es más grande que eso?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't you understand this duel is bigger than just you?

CONTENT: 子供は親の言うことを 聞いていればいいんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Los niños deben obedecer a sus papás!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Children should do as their parents say!

CONTENT: 黙れよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shut up!

CONTENT: 意思拡張AI 停止

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Decision Making Extension AI has been disabled.

CONTENT: バカが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That fool!

CONTENT: エラー? でも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: An error? But...

CONTENT: これは 俺の戦いだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is my fight!

CONTENT: 俺の... 俺だけの!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's mine. Only mine!

CONTENT: さっきまでと動きが違う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No se mueve igual que antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: His moves are different from before!

CONTENT: この人 強い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This guy is strong...

CONTENT: でも 私とエアリアルは 負けません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ¡mi Aerial y yo no perderemos!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But Aerial and I won't lose!

CONTENT: だって だって!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: After all...

CONTENT: このグエル・ジェタークが 負けてたまるかよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Guel Jeturk cannot lose!

CONTENT: やりたいことリスト 全然埋ってない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Aún me quedan muchas cosas en la lista!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's still so much left on my wish list!

CONTENT: スレッタさん やっぱりスゴい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Suletta, you're really amazing.

CONTENT: え? え? え? ミオリネさん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: なななななな... なんか 文字がいっぱい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-My screen is filled with words!

CONTENT: いっぱい... いっぱい文字が...　なんでメッセージ解放してんのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Son muchas! ¿Por qué liberaste todos los mensajes?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So many words! So many words, many words! Why did you release all messages?

CONTENT: 登録した人のだけ表示して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So many words! I said, only from registered contacts.

CONTENT: 勝ったよ 私たち　あ... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You won. We won. Right.

CONTENT: あんたの退学はなし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now you won't be expelled!

CONTENT: じゃ... じゃあエアリアルも ミオリネさんもセーフ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces... ¿El Aerial y tú están a salvo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then Aerial and you are both... safe?

CONTENT: そう! ざまあみろ クソ親父!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's right! Take that, you louse of a father!

CONTENT: よよよよ... よかったね ミ... ミオミオ!

CONTENT: はあ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Excuse me?

CONTENT: ごめんなさい!　なんなの ミオミオって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry! What the heck is \"Mio-Mio\"?

CONTENT: 友達... あだ名で呼ぶの...　リストの結構上のほう... だったから...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como llamar a una amiga por su apodo estaba al principio de mi lista...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Calling a friend by a nickname was near the top of my list, so...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's cute, isn't it?

CONTENT: 却下 センスなさすぎ う...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Rejected. It's super lame.

E-Excuse me...

CONTENT: ご... ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'm sorry!

CONTENT: あなたのこと... 見くびってました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I underestimated you.

CONTENT: あ... あなたは その... とっても強かった... です

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you were, you know, really strong.
